node.title: Delighting In the Almighty- A Practical Guide to Primitive Godliness
node.description: The only thing better than living the Christian life is living the Christian life and relishing it. Loving and enjoying God is one of the greatest privileges that God has given to mankind. And yet, for most of my sincere Christian life, I failed to enjoy God. My love for Him was tepid, at best. In this seminar we will look at why the plant of love failed to grow in my life and how, in practical terms, we can Delight in the Almighty.
